text: Enkal iraivane! Niccayamaka nan en cantatikalai, mikka kanniyam vaynta un vittin camipamaka vacittirukkac ceytu vitten. Atu vivacaya marratoru pallattakku! Enkal iraivane! Avarkal (unnait) tolutu kontiruppatarkaka (anku vacikkac ceyten). Manitarkalil oru tokaiyinarin ullankal avarkalai necikkumpati ni ceyvayaka! (Parpala) kanivarkkankalaiyum ni avarkalukku unavaka alittu varuvayaka! (Atarku) avarkal unakku nanri celuttuvarkal
